venue.name: Microsoft New England Research & Development Center (NERD)

item.description:
With the help of VisiTrend: http://visitrend.com/news.htm this month, Geertjan Wielenga of Oracle will give a presentation on using the NetBeans Platforms to rapidly develop feature rich applications.

 

Bio: Geertjan Wielenga has worked on the NetBeans team for the past 7 years, helping to grow the community around the NetBeans Platform. He's worked as lead technical writer for the NetBeans Platform, as well as technical trainer, and is currently an Oracle Principle Product Manager focused on the NetBeans Platform. He has a popular blog about the NetBeans Platform at http://blogs/sun/com/geertjan
item.name: NetBeans Application Platform
